unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Thinking of getting it for my bajra this year. Last year's floods near Patna ruined everything, lost around Rs. 50000. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps. Is it worth it? Deadline is 25/10/2024, 17:00 hrs. Anyone from Bihar used it? What's the claim process like? Heard SBI is involved. Anyone got experience by 10/11/2024? Please share your thoughts! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, brother! Thinking of getting it for my bajra this year. Last year's floods near Patna ruined everything, lost around rupee fifty thousand. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps. Is it worth it? Deadline is twenty fifth October two thousand and twenty four, five P M. Anyone from Bihar used it? What's the claim process like? Heard S B I is involved. Anyone got experience by tenth November two thousand and twenty four? Please share your thoughts! Hail Farmer!
